posts.cooked:
We reflashed a limelight 2 to photonvision (2023.2.1) and have the vendordependencies on the same version. The limelight is connected to an ethernet switch that runs to the radio.

When we power up the robot, we receive the error Capture(3) 786×137 7.68 KB

Capture(3) 786×137 7.68 KB

Capture(3) 786×137 7.68 KB

strangely, this gets resolved if we restart the photonvision device through the browser window. that is not good though. we do have another raspberry pi available.
Well, that’s fun. Did the previous version work? This could be a bug.
we will try downgrading the photonvision versions
Another thing: did this error continuously show up, and the camera is never found?
we did try both static and dhcp. Also, running AngryIPScanner we did not find the limelight/photonvision at the expected static IP address we set it to

the error was continous until the photonvision device restart

also sometimes it stopped sending new data
Did this work? Might be a bug in our latest version.

sorry, just got to flash the camera to 2023.1.2 I only had the latest dependencies (1.0 json) though, so there was a version conflict. I think maybe something went wrong the first time I flashed the camera to 2023.2.1, so I shall try that again
